definitions.definition: A person who sometimes wears clothes traditionally worn by and associated with the opposite sex ; typically a male who cross-dresses occasionally by habit or personal choice.
examples: Even though Steven used to dress up in his sister's clothes, it still came as a surprise he ended up as a transvestite .

definitions.definition: A person, typically a heterosexual male, who compulsively seeks and derives paraphilic sexual arousal from cross-dressing , especially if the urges and behavior cause the patient distress or social impairment.
An animal that engages in sexual mimicry .

main_definition: ( dated ) A person who sometimes wears clothes traditionally worn by and associated with the opposite sex ; typically a male who cross-dresses occasionally by habit or personal choice.
secondary_definitions: ( clinical psychology , psychiatry , pathology ) A person, typically a heterosexual male, who compulsively seeks and derives paraphilic sexual arousal from cross-dressing , especially if the urges and behavior cause the patient distress or social impairment.
( zoology , dated ) An animal that engages in sexual mimicry .
